sentences.english: ALL personnel will enter the facilities ONLY through the west door of the shower rooms.
sentences.chinese: 所有的人員都應該通過淋浴室的側門進入生產區域的。

sentences.english: Belly-painting isgrowing more popular as a baby-shower activity, Thompson says.
sentences.chinese: 湯普森說，作爲嬰兒淋浴活動，肚皮畫越來越受歡迎。

sentences.english: And rising bills are enough to make even the most bath-fond switch to showers.
sentences.chinese: 日益增加的水電費甚至足以令最愛缸浴的人改爲淋浴。

sentences.english: I got out of the pool and stood under one of the poolside showers while he cleared up.
sentences.chinese: 在他清理泳池的時候，我上來在池邊淋浴。

sentences.english: The showerhead massage is the control that switches the water from a steady stream to a pulsating jet spray.
sentences.chinese: 淋浴噴頭按摩是通過控制水流的脈動和噴灑來完成的。

sentences.english: Shanghai Jinna Shower Room Manufacture Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 上海金納淋浴房製造有限公司。

sentences.english: ZhangLiHua said want to petals in the shower parents brought up.
sentences.chinese: 張麗華便說想要花瓣淋浴以報父母養育之恩。

sentences.english: Nana and Poppy get the bedroom in the back, which is where the toilet and shower are.
sentences.chinese: 老人被安排在後面的臥房裏，裏面有廁所和淋浴。

sentences.english: The shower threw a hard tight stream.
sentences.chinese: 淋浴噴水器噴出一股急流。

sentences.english: he took a shower and changed back into his suit.
sentences.chinese: 他洗個淋浴重新換上那身黑西服。

sentences.english: After you get out of the shower open the door and allow the steam to escape into the rest of the house.
sentences.chinese: 淋浴結束時，打開門讓蒸汽出來進入剩下的空間。

sentences.english: Energy efficient Central Air, Dual paned windows, water saving toilets and showers.
sentences.chinese: 高效節能的中央空調，雙格窗口，節水馬桶和淋浴。

sentences.english: A bath house is where people shower, which is why they're naked.
sentences.chinese: 澡堂是人們洗淋浴的地方，所以他們都是光著身子的。

sentences.english: Our walk in showers range have adjustable seats for you to sit on in the shower.
sentences.chinese: 我們的陣雨走在可調範圍爲您提供淋浴座位上坐了。

definition: to bathe/to immerse oneself in a warm bath
